=== Current Issues ===

* System hangs sometimes on booting with garbled screen, especially when returning from Windows. (seems to be fixed)
* Suspend results in kernel panic when waking up. (seems to be fixed)
* Hibernate results in frozen X when waking up (fixed in Karmic)

* 3D acceleration is slow with Intrepid (fixed in Karmic)
Possible solution:

** kernel 2.6.28-2-generic from jaunty
** add deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/xorg-edgers/ubuntu intrepid main to sources.list
** install
** ii xserver-xorg-video-intel                  2:2.4.97.0+git20081129.5f347020-0ubuntu0t
** ii  libgl1-mesa-dri                           7.3~git20081204.39091cc6-0ubuntu0tormod1  A free implementation of the OpenGL API -- DRI modules
** ii  libgl1-mesa-glx                           7.3~git20081204.39091cc6-0ubuntu0tormod1  A free implementation of the OpenGL API -- GLX runtime
** ii  libglu1-mesa                              7.3~git20081204.39091cc6-0ubuntu0tormod1  The OpenGL utility library (GLU)
** ii  mesa-utils                                7.3~git20081204.39091cc6-0ubuntu0tormod1  Miscellaneous Mesa GL utilities
